description.value:
You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Darkvision]{Darkvision}, @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Low-Light Vision]{Low-Light Vision}, or scent (imprecise) 30 feet. You must have low-light vision before you can gain darkvision with this feat.

If your inherent animal doesn’t typically have a specific type of sense, you can’t gain that sense with this feat.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different sense each time.
